txt.en: You can now gain a hobby!  On your character journal there is a hobby section which is now enabled.  View the hobby panel to learn where the hobby masters are located. You will want to visit a hobby master if you wish to learn more about hobbies or participate in a hobby.

You can now gain a hobby! Open your Hobby panel via the Start menu under 'Character'. View the Hobby panel to learn where the hobby masters are located. You will want to visit a hobby master if you wish to learn more about hobbies or participate in a hobby.
